name: Enrique Rico
bio: I never coded a day in my life until I started Code Fellows in February.  So far it's been an exciting challenge and reminds me that I made a great choice in coming here.  I hope to one day work as a web developer preferably working remote so that I can travel.

name: Lindsay Gilbert
bio: Hey! I'm Lindsay. I have a degree in Mechanical Engineering and before this was a Jr. Project Manager. I started coding at my previous job and really enjoyed it, which brought me to Code Fellows.

name: Brianna Burrows
bio: Brianna is a former recruiter, currently working as a freelance marketing specialist. She plans to study Full-Stack JavaScript in her 401 class at Code Fellows. After graduating, she intends to find a job in London or Berlin. She enjoys scuba diving, monitoring solar weather, and avocados. You can contact her at contact@meetbrianna.com

name: Logan Absher
bio: I began coding two years ago learning Python in a running start class, after that I started at UW taking CSC 142 and 143 and I really enjoyed what I was doing. I wanted to look for a faster alternative for learning programming and after a little research I settled for Codefellows.
